### Chart A

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)

set.seed(1)

data(ny_noaa)

noaa = ny_noaa %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>% 
  mutate(
    prcp = prcp / 10,
    tmin = as.integer(tmin) / 10,
    tmax = as.integer(tmax) / 10
    ) %>% 
  sample_n(5000)
